name: WP create user area
author: kuaza

sections.description:
WordPress for user create new profile area (label)

  • Unlimited create new profile area
  • hidden or show on profile
  • one widget for profile area (single and author page)
  • v.s..

Thanks:
* http://kuaza.com
* and me ðŸ™‚

Translations

The plugin comes with various translations, please refer to the WordPress Codex for more information about activating the translation. If you want to help to translate the plugin to your language, please have a look at the ka_area.pot file which contains all definitions and may be used with a gettext editor like Poedit (Windows).
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin like you always install plugins, either by uploading it via FTP or by using the “Add Plugin” function of WordPress. (Upload directory ‘k_new_profil_area’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory)
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Activate the plugin at the plugin administration page
  4. Settings for plugins edit or save WP user area (under users menu)
sections.faq:
How do hide text shortcode ?

Manuel add themes:

[k_hide]echo reklam_alanlari_array("5","example ads or code or text",false);[/k_hide]

true|false : for only single page true, or single and author page false
